Orem.South Field (Provo):
The Stadium at South Field, more commonly known simply as "South Field", is a soccer-specific stadium in Provo, Utah on the campus of Brigham Young University.
The stadium serves as home to BYU Cougars women's soccer team, as well as the BYU Cougars of the USL Premier Development League, BYU men's rugby and BYU Women's Rugby teams. Hanson Sports was the contractor selected to construct the bleachers at South Field in 2008.
